Package index

Execute Vim commands

rsvim_exec_file()
Execute all commands in a Vim config file
rsvim_exec()
Execute a single Vim command in the source editor

Config file helpers

rsvim_use_template()
Build a Vim config from a template
rsvim_add_command()
Append command to config file
rsvim_is_valid_command()
Check if a Vim ex command is valid
rsvim_default_path()
Get suggested config file path
rsvim_example_path()
Path to rstudiovim example config

Supporting info

rstudio_vim_commands
RStudio Vim Commands data.frame
